name: Kepler Hell
description:
"Give 'em HELL Marine!" 

Kepler Hell is a chaotic verticall-scrolling bullet hell shooter set in deep space.

In their quest for a new  colony, the USF (United Space Federation) won't let some slimey,  soft-bellied ET's stop them and neither will you.

Lead Programmer:  kalestri

Programmer: TheFlyingFinn

Art & UI: cafeDraw

Music: waxwolf

Addtional SFX as follows...
